title: Mourning of Muharram
description: A vast collection of immersive Mid/Side recordings taken from inside a mosque during the Muslim ‘Mourning of Muharram’ ceremony.
longDescription:
The "Mourning of Muharram” is a vast collection of immersive Mid/Side (M/S) recordings that encapsulates the essence and solemnity of the Muharram mourning rituals in the Muslim tradition. 


Recorded from inside a magnificent mosque, this unique sample pack offers a diverse and exhaustive range of audio, allowing you to incorporate the depth and cultural significance of these rituals into your creative projects.


Within this sample pack, you will have access to over 1.5 hours of ritual recordings, including Noah, the heartfelt vocal and crowd lamentations, rhythmic beating of the chest (Matam), percussive musical elements, and the ambient sounds of processions movements and footsteps, all from within the walls of a majestic mosque. Immerse yourself in the magnificence of this sacred tradition, harnessing its profound impact to elevate your game project.


These recordings were captured using Mid/Side Stereo Techniques, ensuring the scale and depth of the mosque space are perfectly captured. All files loop seamlessly for smooth integration into your game project.
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  17 Audio Waves, 17 Audio Cues
  •  107 Minutes of Audio
  •  44.1 KhZ, 16 bit, M/S Stereo WAV
  • Seamless Looping
  • Mac and Windows Supported



Demo - https://soundcloud.com/user-444466580/mourning-of-muharram-sample-pack-demo?si=1445ba08b1304a08abd029fb376b6474&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
